intro: 50 meow cute puzzle levels with co-op!
description:
Mimi the Cat: Meow Together is the cutest puzzle adventure you'll ever play! Get ready for a purr-fect mix of strategy, laughs, and irresistible feline charm. Whether you're flying solo or teaming up with a friend in local co-op, your goal is simple (but oh-so-challenging): help Mimi and her fluffy friends solve puzzles and find their cozy beds.

Why You’ll Love Mimi
Two Ways to Play
Tackle puzzles solo like a puzzle master or grab a friend for some co-op fun where teamwork makes the dream work!

Super-Fun Mechanics
Push boxes, stack stuff, jump between platforms, and get creative with environmental objects to solve tricky puzzles. Think of it as “kitty detective” mode!

Packed with Purr-sonality

50 handcrafted levels to challenge your brain and warm your heart.
9 adorable kittens, including Mimi and her lovable squad.
18 unique outfits to dress up your cats in style (pirate cat? chef cat? Yes, please!).
Relax and Enjoy
With a simple interface, quick level restarts, and a soothing soundtrack, this game is all about fun without the stress. No timers, no resources to manage—just you, Mimi, and loads of good vibes.

Mimi the Cat: Meow Together is the ultimate feel-good game, packed with charm, clever puzzles, and enough cuteness to make anyone say “Meoww!”
